-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Monday, November 06, 2006 4:55 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1693266M] Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - mondullos.com / 74.52.67.234 Subject: [EV1-C1693266M] Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - mondullos.com / 74.52.67.234 ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - mondullos.com / 74.52.67.234 Added by system at Monday, Nov 6 2006 10:48 am X-MailFrom: jsmith@escrow.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Nov 6 10:47:59 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 6 Nov 2006 10:47:40 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 06 Nov 2006 10:47:41 -0600 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from jsmith@escrow.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Gh7dM-0002ES-IQ for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 06 Nov 2006 10:47:40 -0600 Received: from mail.escrow.com ([71.143.242.60] helo=hotrod.corp.escrow.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from jsmith@escrow.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Gh7dH-000FjL-Ov for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 06 Nov 2006 10:47:35 -0600 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C701C2.FA2B6B82" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0 Subject: Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - mondullos.com / 74.52.67.234 Date: Mon, 6 Nov 2006 08:45:33 -0800 Message-ID: <9E6444BEF035C24395AF62A72BBCA02C012CF774@hotrod.corp.escrow.com> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - mondullos.com / 74.52.67.234 Thread-Index: AccBwvo6sQFjn2JmQISovya9DRWdPA== From: "Josh Smith" To: Cc: "ifcc10@ic3.gov" <'ifcc10@ic3.gov'>, "Brandon Abbey" , , "Josh Smith" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Nov 2006 16:47:40.0898 (UTC) FILETIME=[460EE420:01C701C3] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Host, It appears you are hosting a fraud site at mondullos.com This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com and its affiliated licensed escrow services providers, Internet Escrow Services ("IES") and EC Services Corporation ("ECSC"). It has been brought to our attention that your company provides services to a website, [mondullos.com], which is infringing on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com ). This site has stolen content from Escrow.com for the purpose of defrauding consumers attempting to buy and sell over the Internet. Please disable this site immediately Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the [mondullos.com] site, . Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with [mondullos.com], and has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com. Thank you. Josh Smith Security Team Escrow.com 16251 Laguna Canyon Road Suite 150 Irvine, CA 92618 Toll Free 1.888.511.8600 International 1.949.790.5890 MIME element (text/html) Escrow Fraud Site (DMCA) - mondullos.com / 74.52.67.234
